endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all available recreational activities available for booking.
Fetch detailed information about a specific activity, identified by its unique ID.
Reserve a spot for a specific activity, providing necessary user details and preferred time slots.
Cancel an existing reservation, ensuring the spot becomes available for others.
Retrieve a list of tickets for activities the user has reserved or purchased.
Fetch detailed information about a specific purchased ticket.
Validate a ticket for user check-in and usage for the specified activity.
List all active promotions and special offers for activities and reservations.
Apply a promotion code to a user account or reservation to gain associated benefits.
Update user preferences for activity recommendations and reminders.
